channel.title: Cannot play anymore?
channel.description:
Hello Everyone ^^
I'm french but can try to explain my problem, So here I go: I'm not a Java programmer or anything, just a student who want to have fun! So yesterday I have started to work on a RSC server/client and play 10 minutes... Now I'm trying to start back my server but cannot.
1: The Java icon in "Server" folder isnt there anymore. 2: The "Run Server" close automaticly after:
[img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/3357/error2f.png[/img]
3: I cannot "Compile Server", there is the error before he close:
[IMG]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/1866/error1b.png[/img]
Can I do something? I have alterny do everything I have to (Last Java Version, the JDK and Apache etc...) And my "PATH" is ok with ant and my tools.jar work fine.
So, can you please help me? :confused:
Thanks alors, Maxlam

item.title: Cannot play anymore?
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

rofl! I mean. its not like we kinda said that like 15 posts above that…

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot play anymore?
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

[quote=“pesterd, post:16, topic:271437”]i know he fixed it but we already told him how and then he goes…

“O i fixed it. I needed rscd.jar file”

that annoys me,…[/quote]

haha i thought it was funny (hey thats right i needed the rscd.jar to run my server)

item.title: Cannot play anymore?
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“pesterd, post:14, topic:271437”]We answered your question a million times…

the rscd.jar file appears ONLY WHEN YOU COMPILE YOUR SERVER!!

you couldnt compile because you were missing your hexstring.jar file…

once you compile it again, you will get errored…[/quote]

I have solve the problem;

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot play anymore?
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

We answered your question a million times…

the rscd.jar file appears ONLY WHEN YOU COMPILE YOUR SERVER!!

you couldnt compile because you were missing your hexstring.jar file…

once you compile it again, you will get errored…

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot play anymore?
item.dc:creator: @Maxlam Maxlam
item.description:
@Maxlam wrote:

I have solve the problem;
My Java rscd.jar was missing!
Thanks alot for help ^^

But: I think that better to awnser with long sentence and say exactly what is the problem and how solve it :s

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot play anymore?

Ya true go to your data folder/lib and check for all those .jar files your hexstring is missing

item.title: Cannot play anymore?
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

  1. Sometimes it is cause because of out-dated java (as meanstick said)
  2. Your lib folder that contains the Haxstring.jar, xtreme.jar and soforth is not found.

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot play anymore?
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

It’s pretty self explanatory. org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.java
Follow the path and make sure it’s there.

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot play anymore?

Hello Everyone ^^

I’m french but can try to explain my problem,
So here I go:
I’m not a Java programmer or anything, just a student who want to have fun!
So yesterday I have started to work on a RSC server/client and play 10 minutes…
Now I’m trying to start back my server but cannot.

1: The Java icon in “Server” folder isnt there anymore.
